title: When you use the /remake
body: It would be great if it didn't display the defeat screen and when you check match history it would display something akin to a yellow rather than red colour.  Just my thoughts. Thing is that when I remake a game, the game saying defeat kind of just bothers me when the game itself wasn't even really played.

replies.body:
I can see why remake is good.

but it is frustrating to wait 5 mins for a game, spend another 5 in lobby banning and choosing, spend another 1-2 loading and then quit 4 mins into game.

15 mins down the bog.

When limited windows to play exist, thats a fair chunk out of play time.

I can see why it is a good thing really, but it still p!sses me off when people invoke it.
its only wasted time for the team who didnt have the afk but fairs fair.
so you'd rather spend another 20-30 mins fighting a 4v5
